name: Blues Brothers 2000
tagline: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

name: Stealing Harvard
tagline: A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University.

name: How to Be a Player
tagline: A playboy gets the tables turned on him when a party is arranged with all of the women he has been two-timing are in attendance.

name: Candyman: Farewell to the Flesh
tagline: The Candyman arrives in New Orleans and sets his sights on a young woman whose family was ruined by the immortal killer years before.

name: Soul Plane
tagline: Things get raucously funny aboard the maiden flight of a black-owned airline, thanks to some last-minute passenger additions.

name: Firehouse Dog
tagline: Rexxx, Hollywood's top canine star, gets lost and is adopted into a shabby firehouse. He teams up with a young kid (Hutcherson) to get the station back on its feet.

name: Hot Rod
tagline: Self-proclaimed stuntman Rod Kimble is preparing for the jump of his life - to clear fifteen buses to raise money for his abusive stepfather Frank's life-saving heart operation.

name: Out Cold
tagline: A snowboarder's plans for his own snowboard park go awry when an ex-girlfriend returns to town.

name: Drop Dead Fred
tagline: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

name: Monsoon Wedding
tagline: A stressed father, a bride-to-be with a secret, a smitten event planner, and relatives from around the world create much ado about the preparations for an arranged marriage in India.

name: Hamburger Hill
tagline: A very realistic interpretation of one of the bloodiest battles of the Vietnam War.

name: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
tagline: Teenager, Darren Shan, meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a Vampire. After a series of events Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque Du Freak and become a Vampire.

name: Highlander: The Final Dimension
tagline: Deceived that he had won the Prize, Connor MacLeod awakens from a peaceful life when an entombed immortal magician comes seeking the Highlander.

name: The Duchess
tagline: A chronicle of the life of 18th century aristocrat Georgiana, Duchess of Devonshire, who was reviled for her extravagant political and personal life.

name: The Man Who Knew Too Little
tagline: Murray is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assasinate international leaders at a banquet.

name: One Day
tagline: After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Em are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.

name: Repo Men
tagline: Set in the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, it revolves around a man who struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased. He must therefore go on the run before said ticker is repossessed.

name: Letters from Iwo Jima
tagline: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

name: Hit and Run
tagline: Former getaway driver Charlie Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charlie's former gang chase them on the road.

name: Great Balls of Fire!
tagline: The life and career of the wildly controversial rock 'n' roll star, Jerry Lee Lewis.

name: Geronimo: An American Legend
tagline: The story of the Apache chief and his armed resistance to the US Government's subjugation of his people.

name: Broken Flowers
tagline: As the extremely withdrawn Don Johnston is dumped by his latest woman, he receives an anonymous letter from a former lover informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. A freelance sleuth neighbor moves Don to embark on a cross-country search for his old flames in search of answers.

name: The Wings of the Dove
tagline: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

name: Return to Snowy River
tagline: Young Jim Craig returns to his home in the Australian high country. He finds that things are not as he left them - his girlfriend is being pursued by another man, and her father doesn't want Jim back into her life.

name: Hey Arnold! The Movie
tagline: A fourth grader and his best friend set out to stop an industrialist from bulldozing their town.

name: Vice Versa
tagline: During an argument, a divorced executive and his 11 year old son casually touch a magical Tibetan skull, releasing a mysterious power that transfers the father's mind to the body of the son and vice versa. Their problems have just begun.

name: Warrior
tagline: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision corner with his older brother.

name: Haunted Castle
tagline: This IMAX 3D film follows a young musician, Johnny, as he explores his mysterious new home bequeathed to him by his deceased mother. Johnny quickly finds that something is amiss as ghosts and the devil himself welcome him home.

name: Crooklyn
tagline: From Spike Lee comes this vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school-teacher, her stubborn jazz-musician husband and their five kids living in '70s Brooklyn.

name: Crank: High Voltage
tagline: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker that requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

name: Y Tu Mamá También
tagline: In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other.

name: The Crush
tagline: A journalist becomes the unwanted center of attention for a 14-year-old girl whom proceeds to sabotage his life after he refuses her sexual advances.

name: Supergirl
tagline: After losing a powerful orb, Kara, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.

name: Osmosis Jones
tagline: A policeman white blood cell, with the help of a cold pill, must stop a deadly virus from destroying the human they live in, Frank.

name: The Ladies Man
tagline: The Saturday Night Live character gets a big screen treatment.

name: Juwanna Mann
tagline: A basketball star is booted out of the NBA when his on-court antics go too far, so he poses as a woman and joins the WUBA.

name: The Namesake
tagline: American-born Gogol, the son of Indian immigrants, wants to fit in among his fellow New Yorkers, despite his family's unwillingness to let go of their traditional ways.

name: Nixon
tagline: A biographical story of former U.S. president Richard Milhous Nixon, from his days as a young boy to his eventual presidency which ended in shame.

name: The Little Vampire
tagline: A lonely boy becomes best friends with a vampire.

name: Trial and Error
tagline: An actor poses as a lawyer to help his sick friend, and problems develop.

name: The Tailor of Panama
tagline: A tailor living in Panama reluctantly becomes a spy for a British agent.

name: Africa's Elephant Kingdom
tagline: This film explores an elephant clan's search for food and water as seen through the eyes of one old bull.

name: Shaun of the Dead
tagline: A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.

name: The Grifters
tagline: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

name: One Crazy Summer
tagline: An aspiring teenage cartoonist and his friends come to the aid of a singer trying to save her family property from developers.

name: Extremities
tagline: A woman takes revenge on the man who invades her home and tries to rape her.

name: Secrets & Lies
tagline: Successful black woman traces her birth mother to a lower-class white woman, who denies it; emotions run high as everyone's secrets are exposed.

name: A Kid in King Arthur's Court
Dredd
tagline: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

name: Alfie
tagline: A cockney womanizer learns the hard way about the dangers of his actions.

name: Bullets Over Broadway
tagline: In 1920s New York, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

name: The Deep End of the Ocean
tagline: The Deep End of The Ocean is a film about a family's reaction when Ben, the youngest son is kidnapped and then found nine years later, living in the same town, where his family had just moved.

name: Friends with Money
tagline: After she quits her lucrative job, Olivia finds herself unsure about her future and her relationships with her successful and wealthy friends.

name: Labor Day
tagline: Depressed single mom Adele and her son Henry offer a wounded, fearsome man a ride. As police search town for the escaped convict, the mother and son gradually learn his true story as their options become increasingly limited.

name: Mr. Saturday Night
tagline: The life of Buddy Young, a comic legend in flashbacks but an old man looking for work in the present.

name: De-Lovely
tagline: Inspecting a magical biographical stage musical, composer Cole Porter reviews his life and career with his wife, Linda.

name: The Tree of Life
tagline: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.

name: Woodstock
tagline: The film chronicle of the legendary 1969 music festival.

name: The Pick-up Artist
tagline: A womanizer meets his match when he falls for a woman in debt to the mafia.

name: Sugar & Spice
tagline: A popular high school cheerleader becomes pregnant with the star quarterback's child, only to find herself turning to crime to support the lifestyle she wants to live.

name: Body of Evidence
tagline: A woman is accused of killing a man to inherit his millions by having sex with him.

name: Lone Star
tagline: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

name: Case 39
tagline: A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she ever expected.

name: The Adventures of Milo and Otis
tagline: The adventures of a young cat and a dog as they find themselves accidentally separated and each swept into a hazardous trek.

name: Crazy People
tagline: A bitter ad executive who has reached his breaking point, finds himself in a mental institution where his career actually begins to thrive with the help of the hospital's patients.

name: Inside Llewyn Davis
tagline: A week in the life of a young singer as he navigates the Greenwich Village folk scene of 1961.

name: Ghost Town
tagline: Bertram Pincus is a man whose people skills leave much to be desired. When Pincus dies unexpectedly, but is miraculously revived after seven minutes, he wakes up to discover that he now has the annoying ability to see ghosts.

name: Jesus Christ Superstar
tagline: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life, told in an anachronistic manner.

name: The Intouchables
tagline: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caretaker.

name: Critters
tagline: A race of small, furry aliens make lunch out of the locals in a farming town.

name: Back to the Beach
tagline: Frankie and Annette, having grown up and put aside their beach-partying lifestyle, visit their daughter in Southern California and discover there's still some wild times left in them.

name: Rosewood
tagline: A dramatization of a 1923 horrific racist lynch mob attack on an African American community.

name: Frailty
tagline: A man confesses to an FBI agent his family's story of how his religious fanatic father's visions lead to a series of murders to destroy supposed "demons."

name: Playing for Keeps
tagline: A former sports star who's fallen on hard times starts coaching his son's soccer team as a way to get his life together. His attempts to become an adult are met with challenges from the attractive soccer moms who pursue him at every turn.

name: The Rum Diary
tagline: American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.

name: American Me
tagline: A Mexican-American Mafia kingpin is released from prison, falls in love for the first time, and grows introspective about his gangster lifestyle.

name: Flyboys
tagline: The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.

name: 25th Hour
tagline: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

name: Ghosts of Mississippi
tagline: The widow of murdered civil rights leader Medger Evers and a district attorney struggle to finally bring the murderer to justice.
